Its going to be refined more this is a rough version I felt comfortable showing. Its going to fire 30mm rounds at 550rpm. I think im also going to give it ciws capability since it has a very high elevation range and is used against aircraft in real life

Only because I'm single right now. also i have exams these next few weeks so ill slow a bit

PS i forgot how big the phalanx is. WAYY bigger than the goalkeeper

Just tested the surface launched tomahawk cruise missile and have encountered an issue that affects all bdarmory cruise missiles, which is that they usually overspeed and fail to hit the target.

To correct this issue, i have made the following modifications to its config to make it work:

- Doubled turn rate (dps) from 29 to 58

- Reduced Cruise thrust to 15kn

This seems to correct the issue. I recommend a cruise altitude of 475m, although others may work better. 

Not sure if anyone else has encountered this issue, but i have put it up here anyway as it may help.

Thanks for making such a great mod! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
